Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior with external ridge is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394139) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394139)
